testcase.classname: Feature to test duplicate profile registration
testcase.name: Check duplicate profile validation for registration - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given invoke browser........................................................passed And user is on registration page............................................passed When user enters Buggy123, John, Doe Abcd@123 and Abcd@123..................passed And click on the register button............................................passed Then user is already registered.............................................passed

testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid credentials - Example #1.1

testcase.classname: Feature to test Password Validation functionality
testcase.name: Password validation during registration (missing Upper character) - Example #1.1
